Message.Issue: Implement IDisposable on 'AddresServiceTests' because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: 'MyContext'. If 'AddresServiceTests' has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.

Implement IDisposable on 'CategoryServiceTests' because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: 'MyContext'. If 'CategoryServiceTests' has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.

Implement IDisposable on 'ProductServiceTests' because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: 'MyContext'. If 'ProductServiceTests' has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.

Implement IDisposable on 'ReviewServiceTests' because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: 'MyContext'. If 'ReviewServiceTests' has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.

Implement IDisposable on 'UserServiceTests' because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: 'MyContext'. If 'UserServiceTests' has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.

Rule.Name: Types that own disposable fields should be disposable
Rule.Description: Types that declare disposable members should also implement IDisposable. If the type does not own any unmanaged resources, do not implement a finalizer on it.
Rule.Resolution: Implement IDisposable on {0} because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: {1}. If {0} has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.
